meanings.definition: A long narrative poem telling of a hero's deeds
meanings.sent1: The students studied ancient epics in their literature class.
meanings.sent2: The epic told the story of a brave warrior's journey.
meanings.sent3: The epic poem made the hero's adventures sound exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling was so epic that it felt like being in a different world.
meanings.sent5: The epic poem painted vivid pictures of the hero's battles.

meanings.definition: A long film, book, or other work portraying heroic deeds or adventures
meanings.sent1: The movie was an epic that captured the audience's attention.
meanings.sent2: The book was considered one of the greatest epics of all time.
meanings.sent3: Watching the epic on the big screen was a thrilling experience.
meanings.sent4: His journey to success was like an epic unfolding before our eyes.
meanings.sent5: The epic novel took readers on a grand adventure.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of an epic
meanings.sent1: The epic style of storytelling captivated the audience.
meanings.sent2: Her epic tale of bravery inspired many listeners.
meanings.sent3: The epic party was talked about for weeks.
meanings.sent4: His epic journey to the mountaintop was filled with challenges.
meanings.sent5: The epic landscape stretched out before them, vast and majestic.
